title: New jig technology
creator_credit: Adrian Harvey, Bruce Shearer and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: A program for employees and trainees in the automotive repair industry which looks at the development of two new automotive body repair technologies- dedicated jig systems and universal measuring systems. Both are fully explained and the advantages and disadvantages of each discussed.
creator_credit_for_label: Adrian Harvey, Bruce Shearer and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
